::DarkMouse::

She looked at Quickstrike, "Well, shall we try to sneak in now? I'm 
all for getting out of fireing range personally." Referring to the 
bullets raining down on them.

She transformed into mouse mode and slung the rifle onto her back.  
She scurried off towards the ship.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Megatron:
> 
> 
> Megatron growled. "The base is now obsolete. Our goal now is to 
take control 
> of Hell Beast's ship and reprogram the others if possible. Rampage 
is 
> currently in command. But that will not last long, no." He turned 
his head. 
> "I want Dark Mouse and Quickstrike to sneak inside through the 
hatch and see 
> if you two can disable the computer and bring back the files from 
the 
> Darkside that Quickstrike put there earlier. I shall enter after 
you disable 
> the shields. I doubt Rampage will allow us open armed."
>
